PHRASE.LANG: If a dog is man's best friend, then K-9 is a Doctor's best friend! Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]

Si le chien est le meilleur ami de l'homme, alors K-9 est le meilleur ami d'un Doctor ! Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]

Wenn ein Hund der beste Freund des Menschen ist, dann ist K-9 der beste Freund des Doctors! Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]
Se il cane è il migliore amico dell'uomo, K-9 è il migliore amico del Doctor! Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]
¡Si el perro es el mejor amigo del hombre, K-9 es el mejor amigo del Doctor! Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]
If a dog is man's best friend, then K-9 is a Doctor's best friend! Doctor Who logo © BBC 2013. K-9 image © BBC/Bob Baker/Dave Martin 1977. Licensed by BBC Worldwide Limited. [#Legal]
